page.title: 11TREES AND HEDGEROWS
page.content: Approximately a quarter of the total area is covered with woodland, primarily that of Bradley Wood, Hogdigging Copse,Cooper's in the Wood Copse and Streetley Copse.A number of different trees and hedgerows exist in these woods,for instance,{oak,hazel, {pine,hawthorn,elder,spindleberry, {maple, sycamore,beech}and{silverbirch. On the outskirts of the woods,{ash trees grow,along with the occasional { {cherry}or{plum}tree.There are also various bush-like trees _ the{ {wayfaring tree,}the{buckthorn,}the{ {crab apple}and the{bay}tree. In addition,{blackthorn,dog rose, {holly}and{yew}are components of the hedgerows,with{spruce,willow}and{elm making up the remainder of the woodland trees.
